headline: Fidelity Select Communication Services Portfolio Q4 2024 Review
summary: The communication services sector gained 6.81% for the fourth quarter, according to the MSCI U.S. IMI Communication Services 25/50 (Media Linked) Index. Read more here.

headline: Trade Desk (NasdaqGM:TTD) Drops 10% After Securities Fraud Class Action Lawsuit News
summary: Following the announcement of a securities fraud class action lawsuit regarding undisclosed issues with the AI tool Kokai, The Trade Desk (NasdaqGM:TTD) saw its share price decline by 10% over the past week. Despite reporting strong fourth quarter results with a sales increase to $741 million and net income rising to $182 million, the legal challenges seem to overshadow these achievements. Additionally, political and economic uncertainty surrounding new tariffs, which contributed to the...

headline: Nasdaq Sell-Off: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Down 20% and 49% to Buy Hand Over Fist on the Dip
summary: Technology stocks have hit a rough patch of late as investors have been looking to reduce their exposure to riskier assets in the wake of the tariff-induced trade war, leading to an increase in demand for safer investments.  All this explains why the Nasdaq Composite index has entered correction territory.  A drop of 10% to 20% in a major index qualifies as a stock market correction, and it remains to be seen how long the ongoing one may last.
